Posts.Content: cyalata wrote: I had lumpectomy in 11/08, clear margins, 4/12 positive nodes, 6 rounds of chemo tch, radiation,herceptin for 1 yr. & have been on Arimidex for 1 1/2 yrs.  I recently had a cough that would not go away. After a chest x-rays, ct scan, bronchoscopy, it was confirmed that I had adenocarcinoma in my lung & trachea. The drs all agreed it is my breast cancer that metasticized.  I was told to stop the Arimidex since it didn't work & my ER/PR was very low + to begin with & is now negative. I'm sooooo petrified! I'm starting Tykerb & Xeloda tomorrow & wondered if anyone else is on it & how it is.  Any feedback would be so appreciated!  Thank you! Gail Dx 12/2010, IDC, 1cm, Grade 3, 4/12 nodes, mets, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Tykerb & Xeloda cyalata Fitztwins
